channel.title: Exception
channel.description:
uhhhhh.. Well I just added mithril seeds
Here's the expection [code]
Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 65535 at EntityDef.forID(EntityDef.java:55) at RSInterface.method206(RSInterface.java:5704) at RSInterface.method209(RSInterface.java:5760) at client.drawInterface(client.java:10410) at client.drawChatArea(client.java:609) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:10007) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10880) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6106) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] This is what's on line 55.... [code]
stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[i]; [/code] ... How would I keep this from happening?

item.title: Exception
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

uhhhhh… Well I just added mithril seeds

Here’s the expection



Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 65535
        at EntityDef.forID(EntityDef.java:55)
        at RSInterface.method206(RSInterface.java:5704)
        at RSInterface.method209(RSInterface.java:5760)
        at client.drawInterface(client.java:10410)
        at client.drawChatArea(client.java:609)
        at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:10007)
        at client.processDrawing(client.java:10880)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108)
        at client.run(client.java:6106)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

This is what’s on line 55…


        stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[i];

… How would I keep this from happening?

Read full topic
